<JD_START>
Job Title: Sr. Inside Sales Representative

Location: Shelbyville, IN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Research, Sales

Description:
Vaco Indianapolis has partnered with a client near Shelbyville, IN to fill a Sr. Inside Sales Representative position. This position has the potential for a hybrid schedule after training!We are looking for a self-motivated sales professional willing to work independently and support company-wide sales initiatives. This dynamic self-starter will report to the VP of Sales & Marketing. As an integral part of the sales team, this role will be involved with all aspects of the company's sales procedures, become proficient in the company's ERP system, and assist with project management on all in-house sales orders.

Additionally, this role will provide prospecting support, data mining, setting of sales appointments, and conducting sales calls in the Midwest region.

ResponsibilitiesAnalyze data sources in Excel to generate and prioritize leads. Assist in lead follow-up by identifying key decision makers and securing appointments with prospects.Maintain CRM system by entering all prospect information and assure tracking of all correspondence between sales team and prospect, adding relevant notes pertaining to a successful conversion from prospect to customerManage the assignment of leads in company's CRM and distribute those leads to appropriate independent sales rep firms and work closely with Sales Manager to assure proper follow-upProfessionally present company products over-the-phone, via email, and in-person or video meetingSupport Sales Manager and VP of Sales with weekly quoting and sales reports, and monthly preparation for board meetingsSupport company's trade show schedule by securing hotel accommodations, booth coordination, staffing the booth, and post-show lead follow-upDevelop in-depth knowledge and use of Company's ERP systemRequirements:Strong ability to analyze sales data in Excel, conduct market research, and make recommendations based on findingsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsStrong customer-facing and communication skillsProficiency in Microsoft Office suite (Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Teams)Experience working within an ERP system preferredExperience with building products preferredWorking knowledge of CRM software, databases, and tools preferred

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
